description: Nim is a classic game popular in game theory due to some of its interesting mathematical properties. The classical variant is played with two players and piles of objects such as coins or sticks. This skill gives Alexa the ability to play a simple Nim game against you and win whenever possible.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, start nim game and open instructions
Tell nim game to take five from pile three
Tell nim game to start over
name: Nim
shortDescription: Nim is a simple game played with piles of objects. The objective is to beat the other player by taking the last available object.
